question:
Which of the following is true about Fly ash?
  1. It is produced while burning of solid material.
  2. It is very fine gas and rises esaily with the air
  3. It can lower the plant yield
Select the correct answer from the codes given below-
explanation: Fly ash is very fine ash produced by the burning of any solid material. It is very fine and thus rises easily with air. When settled on plant leaves it reduce their yield.
